modShortDescription: Scomar is new in modifying HUD's. So its his first try. He like to play with Deep Pockets, so the HUD is yery close to bottom.
modDescription:
Scomar is new in modifying HUD’s. So its his first try. He like to play with [Deep Pockets](https://7daystodiemods.com/deep-pockets/), so the HUD is yery close to bottom.

## Changelog

* **v1.3:** Alpha 19.1 – Added Zombiekills left and Deaths right from the Toolbelt, switched health and stamina bar.
* **v1.2:** Alpha 19.1 – 10 slot toolbelt support.
* **v1.1:** Added a Center-Marker to the Compass and slight improvements to the visual display.
* **v1.05:** Toolbeltnumbers are better shown now.

**[Download](https://github.com/Scomar82/7-Days-Modlets/raw/master/Scomar82_A19-HUD.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/21124-scomar82_a19-hud/).

**Credits:** [Scomar](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/scomar/)
